title: The Letters of Robert Louis Stevenson - Volume 1
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: I shall send this off to-day to let you know of my new address - Swanston Cottage, Lothianburn, Edinburgh.

title: The Works of Robert Louis Stevenson - Swanston Edition, Vol. 23
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: From1867 the family life became more settled between Edinburgh and SwanstonCottage, Lothianburn, a country home in the Pentlands which Mr.Stevenson first rented in that year, and the scenery and associations ofwhich sank deeply into the young man's spirit, and vitally affected hisafter thoughts and his art.

title: The novels and tales of Robert Louis Stevenson.
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: [SWANSTON COTTAGE, LOTHIANBURN, July, ... I HAVE the strangest repugnance for writing; indeed, I have nearly got myself persuaded into the notion that letters don't arrive, in order to salve my conscience for never sending them off.

title: The novels and tales of Robert Louis Stevenson.
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: [SWANSTON COTTAGE, LOTHIANBURN, July, 1876.'} HERE I am, here, and very well too.
